title: I Believe You
description: An illustrated children's book for sexual assault survivors of all ages."You are Strong.You are Brave.You are Loving.And you can do anything.I promise."From the perspective of the inner Superhero, I Believe You infuses the mind and heart of the child that survived with strength, courage, love, validation, safety, and support.For children who have survived: these healing words provide powerful tools for reclaiming their inner power and sense of self as they embark on their hero's journey.For adults who survived and have been on their hero's journey for years: these just may be the words you have been waiting for.You are not alone.I Believe You.And we are —All of us —Heroes.
author: Emily Pearson
